mapper.select: select cId, cYearClass, cMajorId, cClass, cCollegeId from gy_report_grade where cId = #{cId}
mapper.insert: insert into gy_report_grade (cId, cYearClass, cMajorId, cClass, cCollegeId) values (#{cId}, #{cYearClass}, #{cMajorId}, #{cClass}, #{cCollegeId})
mapper.update:
update gy_report_grade
cYearClass = #{cYearClass},
cMajorId = #{cMajorId},
cClass = #{cClass},
cCollegeId = #{cCollegeId},
where cId = #{cId}
